Name: insulated steel frame
column8: uses a correction factor for R calculation (can not be changed in this csv) -> metal/steel has to be component 1! Do not change this name!

Name: masonry wall
column8: only takes masonry units lambda (this is hardcoded and can not be changed in this csv) -> Masonry unit has to be component 1! Name has to be masonry wall

Name: non-insulated metal substructure
column8: uses a correction factor for R calculation (can not be changed in this csv) -> metal/steel has to be component 1! Do not change this name!

Name: insulated steel substructure
column8: see above, do not change this name
